snippet: “American Masters: Jimi Hendrix — Hear My Train a Comin’” is a documentary about the guitarist whose death in 1970 at the age of 27 cemented his legendary status.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television documentary Jimi Hendrix - Hear My Train a Comin' on PBS series American Masters.
lead_paragraph: “American Masters: Jimi Hendrix — Hear My Train a Comin’” is a documentary about the guitarist whose death in 1970 at the age of 27 cemented his legendary status.

headline.seo: Revisiting Jimi Hendrix on PBS’s ‘American Masters’
headline.main: A Talent Whose Light Was Bright but Brief
headline.print_headline: A Talent Whose Light Was Bright but Brief
